dice.help.desc: Random dice. You can specify the number of dice rolls and DC check.
dice.help.regex.desc: (扔|投|掷|丢)<counts>个[<sides>面]骰子[<times>]次 Roll the specified dice.
dice.help.rule: Modify the check rule of DC.
dice.help.set: Set the default sides number of dice.
dice.message.error: Unable to parse the dice expression:
dice.message.error.value.add_line.out_of: The number of dice re-roll line cannot be less than 2 or greater than ${max}.
dice.message.error.value.advantage.out_o: The number of advantage and disadvantage dice is greater than the total number of dice.
dice.message.error.value.count.out_of_ra: The number of dice cannot be less than 1 or greater than ${max}.
dice.message.error.value.sides.out_of_ra: The sides number of dice cannot be less than 2.
dice.message.error.value.times.out_of_ra: The number of dice rolls cannot be less than 1 or greater than ${max}.
dice.message.error.value.too_long: The number of items in the dice expression exceeds the limit.
dice.message.rule.disable: The check rule has been changed to forward.
dice.message.rule.enable: The check rule has been changed to reverse.
dice.message.set.success: Successfully set the default sides to ${sides}.
